name: The Shadow Thief
description:
Read tutorial before playing game The Shadow Thief

---------------

Control:

L - Leaderboard

N - Next

B- Back

W A S D - Move

F - Interact

R - Restart Level

T - Restart with timer to first level

-------------------------

Tutorial:

We run out of time and made not the best levels but here some short tutorial. 

At first you take the role of thief which try to rob ancient monument. You are not ordinary person, you has some special ability to hide in shadows, it may be shadow from the table or even in your enemy shadow (gray shadow appiarce under some objects). To hide or unhide from shadow use F.

On every level you must open chest with arrows, just repeat pattern which will appear.

Additional:
  • Level 1 is balanced correctly
  • Level 2 isn`t impossible, you have to hide in enemy and get to the chest
  • Level 3, you have to use lever in the left bottom corner to disable arbalets.
  • Level 4 is the last level but it isn`t completed, you can run straight to the chest
